page.title: 20EVENTS IN CHINGFORD
page.content: Chingford Day is a local event.It is held on a saturday in mid-July.There is a fete with stalls and sideshows. Everyone can enter art and craft exhibit At Picketts Lock sports centre there are annual events such as dog shows, fayres,football tournaments and there is also a firework display which you can see from Pole Hill.Other events are school sports,bazaars and concerts There is also a circus held on Ching- ford Plains.Some of the acts are clow- ns,elephants and other animals.Church organise events to. { ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS } These pages of text have been written and researched by pupils,parents and staff of CHINGFORD CofE JUNIOR, LONGSHAW PRIMARY and WHITEHALL PRIMARY schools. {*********
